title: Data Analysis Procedure Overview
subtitle: Vendor Spend Analysis & Dashboard Creation
content:
Welcome to Versatex SOP Platform

This modern, modular platform provides comprehensive Standard Operating Procedures for vendor spend analysis and dashboard creation.

22-Day Delivery

Complete analysis in 22 business days (4 weeks + 2 days)

5-Level Taxonomy

Industry-standard categorization framework for spend analysis

Real-time Progress

Track every step with weighted milestone tracking

Process Overview

The vendor spend analysis process consists of 8 main phases:

  1. Prerequisites & Setup - Initial requirements and system configuration
  2. Data Collection - Gathering vendor spend data from multiple sources
  3. Quality Assessment - Evaluating data completeness and accuracy
  4. Data Cleansing - Standardizing and cleaning the data
  5. Categorization - Applying 5-level taxonomy framework
  6. Dashboard Development - Building Power BI visualizations
  7. Delivery & Implementation - Deploying to production
  8. Quality Management - Ongoing monitoring and improvements

Timeline

The complete process typically takes 20-22 business days from data receipt to dashboard delivery.

Use the navigation menu to explore each phase in detail. Interactive tools and templates are available throughout the process.
